00032 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 //----------------------------------------------------------------------
00036 BOOL CFmiApplication::InitInstance()
00037 {
00038     // InitCommonControls() is required on Windows XP if an application
00039     // manifest specifies use of ComCtl32.dll version 6 or later to enable
00040     // visual styles.  Otherwise, any window creation will fail.
00041     InitCommonControls();
00042     CWinApp::InitInstance();
00043     AfxEnableControlContainer();
00044 
00045     CFmiPcAppDlg dlg;
00046     m_pMainWnd = &dlg;
00047     dlg.DoModal();
00048 
00049     // Since the dialog has been closed, return FALSE so that we exit the
00050     //  application, rather than start the application's message pump
00051     return FALSE;
00052 }
